body_html:
Looked into this one a bit and was able to reproduce it on my machine, I have not updated to the latest master.

For a single array element after the convolution, here are some of the values I got:

0 Difference:1.1920928955078125e-07 First:1.072272777557373 Original:1.0722728967666626
1 Difference:2.9802322387695312e-08 First:0.210195392370224 Original:0.2101954221725464
2 Difference:2.2351741790771484e-08 First:-0.06564547121524811 Original:-0.06564544886350632
3 Difference:5.960464477539063e-08 First:0.03386092185974121 Original:0.033860981464385986
4 Difference:-5.21540641784668e-08 First:-0.008438542485237122 Original:-0.0084385946393013
5 Difference:2.9802322387695312e-08 First:0.20290322601795197 Original:0.20290325582027435
6 Difference:5.960464477539063e-08 First:0.1302279829978943 Original:0.13022804260253906
7 Difference:-4.470348358154297e-08 First:-0.1371903419494629 Original:-0.13719038665294647
8 Difference:-2.9802322387695312e-08 First:-0.4632949233055115 Original:-0.46329495310783386
9 Difference:0.0 First:0.09715934097766876 Original:0.09715934097766876
10 Difference:-1.4901161193847656e-08 First:0.17278563976287842 Original:0.17278562486171722
.....I let this run for a bit

Which would line up with the "it might be expected due to algorithm and precision issue"

This seems to most frequently happen in the lower right hand corner of the convolution's output for some reason.

body:
Looked into this one a bit and was able to reproduce it on my machine, I have not updated to the latest master. 

For a single array element after the convolution, here are some of the values I got: 

> 0 Difference:1.1920928955078125e-07 First:1.072272777557373 Original:1.0722728967666626
> 1 Difference:2.9802322387695312e-08 First:0.210195392370224 Original:0.2101954221725464
> 2 Difference:2.2351741790771484e-08 First:-0.06564547121524811 Original:-0.06564544886350632
> 3 Difference:5.960464477539063e-08 First:0.03386092185974121 Original:0.033860981464385986
> 4 Difference:-5.21540641784668e-08 First:-0.008438542485237122 Original:-0.0084385946393013
> 5 Difference:2.9802322387695312e-08 First:0.20290322601795197 Original:0.20290325582027435
> 6 Difference:5.960464477539063e-08 First:0.1302279829978943 Original:0.13022804260253906
> 7 Difference:-4.470348358154297e-08 First:-0.1371903419494629 Original:-0.13719038665294647
> 8 Difference:-2.9802322387695312e-08 First:-0.4632949233055115 Original:-0.46329495310783386
> 9 Difference:0.0 First:0.09715934097766876 Original:0.09715934097766876
> 10 Difference:-1.4901161193847656e-08 First:0.17278563976287842 Original:0.17278562486171722
.....I let this run for a bit
> 

Which would line up with the "it might be expected due to algorithm and precision issue"

This seems to most frequently happen in the lower right hand corner of the convolution's output for some reason.
